publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3606 Alex Johnstone: Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status—That the Parliament supports a campaign to encourage the UK Government to obtain World Heritage Site status from UNESCO for Arbroath Abbey, not only on the basis of its connection with the Declaration of Arbroath of 1320 but also for its outstanding architecture; recognises that the Declaration of Arbroath more than satisfies UNESCO’s requirement for the site to be directly associated with literary works of outstanding universal significance, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support Arbroath Abbey as an excellent Scottish candidate for the UK Tentative List.

S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Christine Grahame*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Mitchell*, Murdo Fraser*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Ms Sandra White*, Fiona Hyslop*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Derek Brownlee*, Nora Radcliffe*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-3606 Alex Johnstone: Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status—That the Parliament supports a campaign to encourage the UK Government to obtain World Heritage Site status from UNESCO for Arbroath Abbey, not only on the basis of its connection with the Declaration of Arbroath of 1320 but also for its outstanding architecture; recognises that the Declaration of Arbroath more than satisfies UNESCO’s requirement for the site to be directly associated with literary works of outstanding universal significance, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support Arbroath Abbey as an excellent Scottish candidate for the UK Tentative List. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Margaret Mitchell, Murdo Fraser, Mrs Nanette Milne, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson, Derek Brownlee, Nora Radcliffe, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Shiona Baird, Mr Brian Monteith, Bill Aitken
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Marlyn Glen*
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Shona Robison*
S2M-3606 Arbroath Abbey World Heritage Site Status (lodged on 21 November 2005) Rosie Kane*
